type.description: Button type, Can be set to default primary info success warning danger
type.description_zh: Button type, Can be set to default primary info success warning danger

native-type.description: Native button type, Can be set to button submit reset
native-type.description_zh: Native button type, Can be set to button submit reset

size.description: Button size, Can be set to normal mini small large
size.description_zh: Button size, Can be set to normal mini small large

loading-radius.description: Loading radius, Can only be used when loading-type="circle"
loading-radius.description_zh: Loading radius, Can only be used when loading-type="circle"

loading-type.description: Loading type, Can be set to circle wave cube rect disappear
loading-type.description_zh: Loading type, Can be set to circle wave cube rect disappear

loading-size.description: Loading size, Can be set to large normal small mini
loading-size.description_zh: Loading size, Can be set to large normal small mini

auto-loading.description: Autoload mode for easy handling of asynchronous tasks
auto-loading.description_zh: Autoload mode for easy handling of asynchronous tasks

icon-container.description: Whether to serve as an icon container
icon-container.description_zh: Whether to serve as an icon container

elevation.description: Elevation level, options true false and level of 0-24
elevation.description_zh: Elevation level, options true false and level of 0-24

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when the button is clicked. Not triggered when loading or disabled status is true
events.description_zh: Triggered when the button is clicked. Not triggered when loading or disabled status is true

events.name: touchstart
events.description: Triggered when the button is touchstart, Not triggered when loading or disabled status is true
events.description_zh: Triggered when the button is touchstart, Not triggered when loading or disabled status is true
